abilities.name: Poor Manual Dexterity
abilities.description: The bots have no hand of cards. Bots cannot discard cards. If a human would take a card from a bot, that human draws a card instead. If a human would give a card to a bot, discard that card, and that bot scores one victory point.

abilities.name: Hates Surprises
abilities.description: Ambush cards cannot be played against bots.

abilities.name: Market
abilities.description: The Market is a row of five face-up cards. The order of its cards cannot be changed.

steps.name: Place Warriors
steps.description: Place 1 warrior in each clearing on the river.

steps.name: Fill Trade Posts Tracks
steps.description: Place 9 trade posts on the matching spaces of your Trade Posts tracks.

steps.name: Gain Starting Payment
steps.description: Place 1 warrior in your Payments box.

steps.name: Stock Market
steps.description: Draw 5 cards and add them to your Market.

steps.name: Stock the Market
steps.description: Draw cards and add them face up to the Marketâ€™s right side until it has five cards.

steps.name: Craft
steps.description: Craft the first card added to the Market this turn that shows an available item, scoring one victory point. (Discard it, leaving four cards.)

steps.name: Set Order
steps.description: The order is the rightmost Market card.
